evidence.claim: National MedTrans utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, indicating a focus on health data security.
Integration with EHR systems using FHIR and HL7 standards is highlighted in their developer documentation.
EDI transaction sets such as X12 are part of their operations, facilitating claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data exchange, likely sends/receives X12 transactions.
matched_use_cases: data integration with payers and providers
